channel.title: Lapz World
channel.description: A blog were I share whats on my mind

item.title: Tox
item.description: I have been working on a programming langauge called #Tox# that is a statically based programming language that is written in Rust and is based on Lox. Lox is the progamming language that you a reader implement when going through the Crafting Interpreters.
